text: The Miani, are a Pashtun tribe, they mainly live in the Gomal plains which are part of Tank District in the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. A few of the tribe also live in the Frontier Region of Dera Ismail Khan District and in Afghanistan. Category:Tank District Category:Tribes of Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Miani (Pashtun tribe)
